name: Breka Bakery & Cafe
address: 4554 Main St, Vancouver, BC V5V 3R5, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Eclair
hasMenuItem.description: A light and hollow pastry filled with whipped cream, custard, and dipped in dark chocolate

hasMenuItem.name: Cretzel Ham&Cheese Melt

hasMenuItem.description: Rosy-red layers of chocolate sponge, smothered in cream cheese frosting, and chunks of chocolate truffle pieces inside!

review.reviewBody: I was surprised by how much chocolate covering and cream was in the Chocolate Eclair- definitely going to be a favorite of mine going forward. The Mousses were good but not amazing, which is why I'm giving 4 stars. Prices are very reasonable compared to most places on DD.

Usually pretty good for the price. Didn't receive the Copenhagen in my order unfortunately ! The Banoffee Tart is great. Though they might have changed their recipe for the cream because it lost a lot of substance recently. The Bocconcini & Pesto Sandwich and Gril Cheeseled are go to-s.
I love their Dulce de leche donut and Pistachio filled donut
Breakfast Croissant Chocolate Custard Donut -Dulce De Leche Donut Caramel Macchiato Every thing is delicious Thank you!!!
I really loved The Ultimate Greek Salad I could eat like 5
